context: Zillow launched in 2006 and rapidly grew to dominate real estate listings. Trulia was main independent competitor before eventual 2015 acquisition. Company provided Zestimate home valuations.

competitors.name: Trulia
competitors.notes: Founded 2005, main competitor before 2015 acquisition for $2.5B

competitors.name: Realtor.com
competitors.notes: NAR-owned listing site, official MLS data

competitors.name: Homes.com
competitors.notes: Real estate listing and search portal
